verses.name: Exodus 37:22
verses.text: Their knops and their branches were of the same: all of it was one beaten work of pure gold.

verses.name: Exodus 37:23
verses.text: And he made his seven lamps, and his snuffers, and his snuffdishes, of pure gold.

verses.name: Exodus 37:24
verses.text: Of a talent of pure gold made he it, and all the vessels thereof.

verses.name: Exodus 37:25
verses.text: And he made the incense altar of shittim wood: the length of it was a cubit, and the breadth of it a cubit; it was foursquare; and two cubits was the height of it; the horns thereof were of the same.
